author: William Channing
message: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: If you have no respect for your own values how can you be worthy of respect from others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Alphonse Karr
message: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
title: Thought of the day

author: W. H. Auden
message: To choose what is difficult all ones days, as if it were easy, that is faith.
title: Thought of the day
